jp.pay.android.plugin

インタフェース CardScannerPlugin

  • 既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    PayjpCardScannerPlugin

    public CardScannerPlugin

    Card scan plugin interface

        start scan activity

        パラメータ:
        activity - called activity

      • startScanActivity

        start scan activity from fragment

        パラメータ:

      • onActivityResult

        boolean onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                         int resultCode,
                         android.content.Intent data,
                         jp.pay.android.plugin.CardScannerPlugin.CardScanOnResultListener listener)

        pass result from Activity or Fragment's onActivityResult to listener.

        パラメータ:
        requestCode - requestCode of onActivityResult
        resultCode - resultCode of onActivityResult
        data - data of onActivityResult
        listener - listener

      • onRequestPermissionResult

        void onRequestPermissionResult(android.app.Activity activity,
                               int requestCode,
                               kotlin.Array[] grantResults,
                               jp.pay.android.plugin.CardScannerPlugin.CardScannerPermissionDelegate delegate)

        Delegate Activity.onRequestPermissionsResult

        パラメータ:
        activity - activity
        requestCode - code requested
        grantResults - results
        delegate - if user select "never ask again", delegate callCardScannerPermissionDelegate.onNeverAskAgainCardScannerPermission
        関連項目:
        Activity.onRequestPermissionsResult

        requestCode - code requested
